name: Kale Salad from Oster®
author: Oster® Versa®
summary: This colorful kale salad with carrots, bell peppers, and peanuts is tossed with apple cider vinaigrette for a delicious side-dish salad or light lunch.
ingredients: 2 medium red or yellow bell peppers, sliced thin
1 cup dry roasted lightly salted peanuts, divided
½ cup extra virgin olive oil
directions: Combine kale, bell peppers, carrots and 3/4 cup peanuts in a large bowl
Place remaining ingredients in Oster® Versa® Performance Blender; add remaining peanuts
Blend on HIGH for 1-1/2 to 2 minutes or until combined
) Pour desired amount of dressing over kale mixture and toss to coat
Serve salad immediately or refrigerate, covered, up to 1 day before serving
